title: Medication Reminder Mobile App
description: A user-friendly app enabling remote medication scheduling for seniors, bridging the tech gap for caregivers and patients. Features include medication recognition for accurate intake, alarm reminders and a rewards system promoting adherence.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This project is designed for learning ReactJS and NodeJS from the extension of a Udemy full stack course. An addition of css modules was used for the styling from reference and learning from a youtube video. This portfolio serves as a platform to display my resume, projects, skills, and experience to prospective employers.

title: GitHub Profile Finder
description: This simple project was created to grasp the workings of RestAPI, focusing on data fetching and presentation. It functions as a GitHub Profile finder, allowing users to input a person's GitHub username and retrieve information about their profile.

title: ScalaFX Calculator
description: The application comprises a comprehensive calculator offering fundamental arithmetic operations like addition, multiplication, subtraction, and division alongside having scientific calculator features, encompassing operations for square, cube, square root, cube root, sine, tangent, and cosine.

title: GamersDen E-Commerce Website
description: The Gamersâ€™ Den e-commerce platform is dedicated to retailing a diverse range of gaming merchandise, including laptops, desktops, mice, keyboards, and monitors. Customers have the ability to browse and purchase products, adding them to a cart for convenient checkout.

title: N-Queens-Problem
description: This project is the solution to the NQueens problem developed for Artificial Intelligence group project, the process can be visualized by a text based chess board.
